title: The Secret at Pheasant Cottage
description: Lucy has lived with her grandparents at Pheasant Cottage since she was a little girl, but she has dim memories of someone else. Who was it? What are her grandparents hiding from her? Lucy is determined to find the answers, but it turns out to be harder than she expected.From Patricia St. Johnâ€”nurse, missionary, relief worker, and writer of many books for children.
author: Patricia St. John
